channel.title: Judgment on Sam Killermann's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Judgment on Sam Killermann's Blog

item.title: Let Your Teacher Grade Your Test
item.description: I did a show earlier today, which isn’t that odd, or thought-provoking. I do shows a lot. It’s what I do. But the show today was different from any show I’ve done, because it was over Skype. That was a first for me.
